caption.p: Comparison of sensitivities of the conventional RT-PCR, nested RT-PCR, qRT-PCR, and RT-LAMP assays. A. detection limit of the conventional RT-PCR assay, B. nested RT-PCR, C. qRT-PCR and RT-LAMP assays. (D, E, and F): D. electrophoretic detection, E. visualization in daylight, and F. in UV light for the amplification of the plasmid pMD-PPgV (1 × 10 6-1 × 10 0 copies). Tubes and lanes 1–7, 10-fold serial dilutions (from 1 × 10 6-1 × 10 0 copies) of the plasmid standards of pMD-PPgV. Tube and lane 8, negative control; lane M, 2000 bp DNA marker.
